definition: no longer valid, someone who is incapacitated by a chronic illness or injury, injure permanently
details:
adjective
- no longer valid
= example: no longer valid
- having no cogency or legal force
= example: having no cogency or legal force
noun
- someone who is incapacitated by a chronic illness or injury
= synonyms: shut-in
verb
- injure permanently
= synonyms: handicap, disable, incapacitate
- force to retire, remove from active duty, as of firemen
